pageProduct.name: Sukin For Men Facial Cleanser 225ml
pageProduct.description:
Â 

General Information

Say hello to our natural Men's Range, formulated specifically for Men's skin! Our daily Cleanser For Men removes a build-up of dirt and oil on the skin with a mix of Baobab Extract and Tasmanian pepper to soothe. Aloe Vera helps to leave skin feeling refreshed, clean and hydrated. A masculine blend of Cinnamon and Citrus refreshes the senses

Ingredients

Water (Aqua), Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Decyl Glucoside, PEG-150 Pentaerythrityl Tetrastearate, Hydrolyzed Adansonia Digitata Extract (Baobab), Tasmannia Lanceolata Fruit/Leaf Extract (Tasmanian Pepper), Glycerin, Cinnamomum Zeylanicum Bark Oil (Cinnamon), Citrus Nobilis (Mandarin Orange) Peel Oil, Citrus Aurantifolia (Lime) Oil, Piper Nigrum (Pepper) Seed Oil, Phenoxyethanol, Benzyl Alcohol, Limonene*. *Natural Component of Essential Oil

Directions

Apply a small amount to moist hands and lather with water. Gently massage into skin. Rinse thoroughly with water. Use once or twice daily
